Class UserDB

java.lang.Object
database.Database<User>
database.UserDB
public class UserDB extends Database<User>
Manages a collection of users, providing methods for creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and saving user data to a CSV file.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class database.Database

    filename
